bug.author: omarchakroun
bug.summary: assertion error when trying to run carla on windows
bug.description: Hi there, i'm newby in carla really newby and just get it installed on windows based on the steps on the documentation. i was trying to run town03 example to make sure that everything is working but i got an assertion error. when generating the project and compiling it under VS there is no error. can someone please help. thank you and best regards. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68866773/89558520-4ea15c80-d7e2-11ea-9956-5ed310b69c85.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Sorry for the delay, we are in the middle of the vacation season. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Axel1092>@Axel1092</denchmark-link> could you help with this?

Hi germanros, Yesterday in fact, i was able to resolve the issue. I was using the wrong asset package. I was using the assets from the 0.9.9 with carla version 0.9.10. Thank you again for the support, Omar
